attributes.description:
Wow what an AWESOME 4x4 Camper!! Built by Travestar onto a LWB VW Amarok!! It has everything you'll need to go anywhere you want to. Accident free, full service history and very well looked after by an elderly couple. Lots o features and extras including: Hot and cold water shower with onboard water tank and geyser, Cartridge toilet, Solar panels on the roof with inverter and batteries for when your off grid, Two drawer fridges with 2 plate gas stove, Microwave, Lots of storage and cupboard space, Extra fuel tank, Fiamma awning, 2  spare wheels, On board ARB compressor to pump rear air suspension and tyres, Touch screen radio with reverse camera, Spotlights, nudgebar, towbar, sidesteps and more...
Call now to make this AWESOME 4x4 Camper yours!!
Finance Available and 
Trade-ins Welcome
attributes.title: 2011 Volkswagen Amarok 2.0 TDI Trendline (90kW) 4Motion Single-Cab

attributes.description:
This 2011 Mercedes-Benz C200CGI Estate Elegance Auto is practical, desirable and refined family holdall. The C-Class is easy to drive and maintain. It really is a Mercedes that's fit for everyone. It comes with power steering, electric windows, multi-functioning steering, leather seats, air conditioning and radio/CD player. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle is being reduced from 149 995 to 139 995.
